DOC.brief_summary: The investigator recruit participant randomize controlled trial evaluate usability educational value nutrition education touchscreen computer program target Spanish-speaking Latina caregiver child 2 . Participants randomized intervention group - use computer program control group - use program . They ask basic demographic question , nutrition knowledge question computer user ask usability question . Objectives 1 . Evaluate subjective objective usability touchscreen computer . 2 . Determine whether health knowledge nutrition topic enhance use computer module .
DOC.brief_title: Infant Nutrition : Evaluation Educational Touchscreen Computer Program
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have child 2 care 2 . Consider Latina 3 . Are Spanishspeaking Exclude child major medical issue interfere feeding
